hackathon-description-text: Please describe your hackathon project. Things to consider: What does it do? What inspired you to make it? What technologies did you use? What was challenging? What did you all learn?
hackathon-eligibility: Anyone at the hackathon who registered.
hackathon-requirements: A project that is technology related.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=1455 Perry St, Blacksburg, VA 24060, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Build to learn fosters development of any technology with emphasis on Machine Learning and Internet of Things.

hackathon-description-header: Hackers at Virginia Tech's fall internal hackathon
